descriptionlist.description: Custom added icons for the Milkshake theme. Only for those icons which weren't theme'd by the creator.

screenshot.description: My icons pictured: Workday, MyFitnessPal, Narwahl
My icons pictured: Fandango, Mario Run, Google Voice, LoL Friends, Discord, Vasa Fitness, myDlink Lite, Apple TV Remote, TeamViewer, Torguard, GasCubby, Best Buy, Red Laser, Bound

changelog.change: Altered the ALT icon for Apple TV Remote to have the glyph be slightly smaller as it was too big.
